website_summaries.verdict: This smaller cork board is the ideal size and style to fit in any office or classroom space.
pros: Comes with 10 colored pins and tacks
Aluminum frame offers durability and an industrial look for professional settings
cons: Backed by cardboard rather than a steady surface
Not the best pick for constant re-tacking

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a good bulletin board for the kitchen, when I stumbled upon this one on Amazon. Tried other bulletin boards, but they were made poorly. They would either fall apart or the push pin would not hold securely into the board. This bulletin board set works well, and better yet, it is not too large but yet big enough to hold my grocery lists and important notes/reminders
customer_reviews.author: Tigerkitty

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for the price. It came boxed twice for safety and was easy to place on my wall, just needed two thumbtacks, which are even included if you don't have any lying around. The material feels nice and the board was deep enough to take the entire backing of my pins. You can't go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: M. Metz

customer_reviews.title: 16"x12" cork bulletin board
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, small cork board. The pins go in all the way and stay put. It is a small board but that is what I wanted to post reminders or to-do and to-buy lists. This seems to be the only board that has a nice aluminum frame with the nicely rounded corners. The hanging points slide back and forth to accommodate different hanging requirements. They are on the long side so if you plan on hanging it vertically, you will have to figure out your own way to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Desert DogTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: This bulletin board is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful blue fabric bulletin board is the best!! EASY TO HANG ON WALL---it has adjustable hanging hooks. It's the perfect size for my home office, and it's good-looking with its bright, medium-blue fabric contrasting with the frame. The size is just right for my needs, 24" X 18". Packed very well, too. Thank you, Navy Penguin, for making such a fine product! (10 color pins included.)
customer_reviews.author: Elsin A. Perry

customer_reviews.title: So great, I bought another one.
customer_reviews.text: These small cork boards are perfect for my needs. I used this in my office in between the top of the cupboards/shelves and my built in desk. The cork is thick and plush and easy for the push pins to go in. The frame is a light silver metal with movable hangers to slide back and forth for the perfect hang ups. I used the Commando clear hooks (1 - lb.) to hang on. I was so thrilled with the first one, I ordered another for the other side of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. It is sturdy but light. It was easy to install because the hanger are on top and not behind the board. I wanted the board to hang with the short dimension top and bottom so I had to remove the hangers and reattach them. Not too difficult if you pry them carefully. The hangers also slide so you can adjust how far apart you put the wall hooks or whatever you are hanging it on. Overall a good product. Looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Franz S.

customer_reviews.title: Great with RVing!
customer_reviews.text: We received this bulletin board within two days, a day before leaving on our across nation RV trip to Missouri and back to Washington. It was easy to mount the pin map with thumb tacks. The board is mounted with Command hooks. It is light enough to not fall with rattling of the RV. The aluminum border and metal slide hanging brackets made it that much easier to mount on wall. We use 1/8 inch pins to track our travels and stays. The pins hold very well into the cork. Our only wish is that the backing is thicker and more puncture proof.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Sliding hangers on top edge a surprising feature
customer_reviews.text: Metal frame around edges of cork board. On top edge, the 2 sliding hangers allow for flexible wall mounting. Other bulletin boards have fixed mounting tabs only on the corners. Nice touch to include packets of thumbtacks and pushpins with it. Don't overlook them when opening. Since I'm lazy, I just stuck 2 of the pushpins into the drywall, hung up the bulletin board and began using it immediately. Others might prefer a more secure mounting solution using wall anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: A Pleasure :) :) :)
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. If I needed another product from Blue Penguin I would be pleased to rely upon them for my needs. Thank you for your consideration & patience with my needs as a customer Blue Penguin. Everyone be safe and well, have fun, with your families & friends (even if by phone). :) :) :) Respectfully, John Cunningham II 09-20-2020 A.D. 6:59pm PDT :)
customer_reviews.author: JWC II

customer_reviews.title: Tack City
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little tack board. I use many tack boards. This one is small. It has a metal frame, a metal back, and metal hanging mounts. I have hung this from the ceiling, and chose this one because it had the mounting hooks already attached. I am not sure what is behind the blue fabric (where you tack into), but it feels like foam (as opposed to cork).
customer_reviews.author: Pierce Lilholt

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bulletin/Tack Board at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I am a Procurement Officer for a Municipality in Texas. I purchased this bulletin board for one of our Municipal Court employees. Their offices were recently streamlined and all desk hutches were removed. But with the hutches went to tack boards. This employee wanted somewhere to display her photos & some personal effects. I "surprised" her with this bulletin board. She loves it! This employee also happens to be my significant other. Thank you for this fine product and fast, easy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: FIRECAPT

customer_reviews.title: Nice little board
customer_reviews.text: Nice little board. I wanted the clips on a different edge so we could hang it long ways. It was easy enough to take the screws off of one corner and just move the clips.
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY L GETTLE

customer_reviews.title: Comes with amazing way to hang already attached! Hung it in less than a minute! LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Looking for something not to large to hang over my teenagers desk for him to stick reminders too--hunted around on Amazon and came across this one. It was a little more expensive than others but the reviews sold me. SO GLAD I did!! It comes with already attached sliders at the top that make it incredibly easy to hang and it is the perfect size for us! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lush

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The first order I got was totally damaged, with both edges bent and twisted. I reached out to Navy Penguin and sure enough, Mr. Tomas Mraz did an amazing job to fix the issue. Customer support is excellent and was very efficient with the issue that I had with my order. I will definitely order again. My first review wasn't posted for some reason, Amazon didn't post it. I hope this one will. Again, excellent item...not too pricey, good quality and outstanding customer support.
customer_reviews.author: kwiksilber

customer_reviews.title: Bulletin board
customer_reviews.text: This is great for me to use for notes as i work from home during this pandemic. My husband and I are sharing a desk space, and my things keep "moving" and I can't find them. This gives me my own space to stick post its. I love that it came with push pins too. I used 3M command hooks to attach to wall.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Best Bulletin Board
customer_reviews.text: This is a great board! It is sturdy yet lightweight making it easy to use. No worries of young children getting hurt. It has tabs for hanging and they are moveable so it will fit anywhere. I have magnetic hooks on side of filing cabinet and I was able to hang this there due to moveable tabs. Price is within anyone’s budget. My students love telling stories now!
customer_reviews.author: VH

customer_reviews.title: the most sturdy thing  I ever bought!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a quick cork board for my desk mess of papers. this one is way more sturdy than I expected. it will last me the rest of my life. Quickly delivered, in strong packaging, I felt like I was a teacher getting school supplies for my classroom. I usually buy cheap Walmart supplies. This is a wonderful product. I ordered the blue board, for my zen den. very pretty. American built I think.
customer_reviews.author: researcher

customer_reviews.title: It has sliding hanging tabs!
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement item for another bulletin board. What I like about this board is that there are two hanging tabs that slide along a track on top of the frame. I was able to adjust them so that this board hangs of the same nails as the other one. There was no need to put more holes in the wall. "
customer_reviews.author: Anniebuddy

customer_reviews.title: This was a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the board. Very light weight. Cork board is substantial. Even my large thumb tacks do not go all the way through. The wall hangers on the top slide, so you have options on where to put the nails to hang it. Well built, and looks nice. Very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crucial part of home organization!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and easy to hang, this piece is an essential part of my "command center" that I'm organizing in our new home.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Hang! Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my vision board!!! It was easy to hang on the wall and was the perfect size for my little project
customer_reviews.author: Nequa G

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I had a very specific use in mind for a cork board - displaying my PAX East badges and pins! Although this board was a little more than I wanted to spend, it was exactly what I had envisioned and I’m very pleased with how everything turned out. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Carr

customer_reviews.title: Thick enough that the push pins go all the way in
customer_reviews.text: The two things I like the most about it are the triangular "hooks" that are big enough I can use command strip hooks to hang it from the wall and the fact that the board is thick enough I can push the push pins all the way in so I'm not worried about them falling out. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Love this little bulletin board.
customer_reviews.text: Super duper cute bulletin board. I have this and the matching whiteboard right next to my desk in my home office. They look great together. The item is real nice quality. The metal is solid., the corners have rubber bumpers. There are triangle hooks for hanging it horizontally. The corkboard works great too, you can push the pins all the way in and it doesn't feel cheap. I would certainly buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Simply put - a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I buy this before I attempted to use those silly pieces of cork that kept falling down? This bulletin board is just wonderful..... It's lightweight, looks good and is so easy to hang. You can utilize press-on hooks, or put nails in the wall...whatever works for the individual. Nice (and considerate) touch for them to add the pushpins!
customer_reviews.author: Always Reading

customer_reviews.title: Well made, conveniently sized bulletin board.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to give the family a place to post notes and reminders to each other. The 16" x 12" was sufficinet for lots of notes and a nice size to be unobtrusive. Nice cork lining and thick enough to be a nice base for the included pins. All-in-all, very satisfied with this item. Arrived well packed and on time.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Small Space Cork Board
customer_reviews.text: This is well made, light weight and attractive. I am very pleased with it. Unlike some reviewers, I like the metal and plastic frame rather than the black plastic or wood frames found on so many other cork boards. It is perfect for the small space next to my desk. One thing I might suggest is to make the hanging "triangles" a bit smaller or of a different shape; the triangles take up a significant amount of height in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Hermine I. Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: The ideal board for pushpins
customer_reviews.text: Received in perfect condition--shipped completely enclosed in heavy corrugated cardboard. The design is ideal, as is the fabrication. The protected corners enclosing the lightweight aluminum frame maintain it perfectly flat. Hanging clips are done brilliantly. Full length of pushpin in enclosed in the board. Excellent value. Well worth the cost. This represents the highest level of industrial design and Quality Control.
customer_reviews.author: Dr U.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: visually appealing, but low quality. Not meant for consistent use, backing for pin board is just cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES MAREK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This went on the wall perfect where our house phone is. Like that I can now thumb tack on the cork and not the wall since the wall has been filled recently painted.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Quality, lightweight bulletin board
customer_reviews.text: The bulletin board arrived quickly and in perfect condition. It was incredibly well packaged to prevent damage. It is SO lightweight---I was shocked! Pins & tacks very easy to insert and remove, and they stay in place. Hanging the board was a cinch with the attached adjustable hangers. It was a bit expensive, but I am pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Although fairly light in weight, the board is sturdy and well made. I would buy this item again if I needed another cork fronted board. The pins are a nice adder.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Great little corkboard for the small space we had. We had to mount it vertically rather than horizontally, which meant we couldn't use the built-in hangers on the long side, but that was the limitation of our space and not a problem with the product. An option for vertical hangers or hangers that can be moved are the only improvements I could suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Janica York Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great Small Bulletin Board
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent bulletin board that works great in small spaces. It is lightweight and easy to hang. If you just need a board to post a few items and are tight on room, this works very well. It is a great little board for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Diane O

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a smaller size bulletin board for a small space. I was really pleased with this one. Its very well made and sturdy. The hanging hooks are a nice feature. When I asked a question about moving the hooks I got a quick pleasant response. They even told me they would replace the board if I damaged it! The switch was simple. I am very impressed with this board and the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: so was easy to hang on the wall
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bulletin board for my office, but wanted something different than a typical cork board. This has worked perfectly! It is extremely light, so was easy to hang on the wall, and no sides of wear and tear when repositioning things on the board. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: sm

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small bulletin board to place near the door from the house into the garage. I wanted to post reminder notes on this bulletin board. This is just the right size and fit near the door. Yahoo!
customer_reviews.author: rhomboid

customer_reviews.title: glad I read the reviews which helped me in deciding ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm, glad I read the reviews which helped me in deciding what board I wanted. I got the 24 by 18 which is perfect. The blue is a nice color -the push pins with the exception of the thumb tack push pin is nice. The board was packaged carefully which I was glad because from one of the review was recd dented etc. Also which was good easy to hang with hooks already on the frame.
customer_reviews.author: ALEJANDRA

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality product. I never had one other than woth cork. This adds some style and color. My only mistake was a totally misjudged size. I cannot use this for initial intentions. However, it was incredibly affrodable and may just purchase another later that is larger. Easy to hang with sliding hooks so u dont need to measure your nails perfectly . Very sturdy. A+
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hotek

customer_reviews.title: little but mighty
customer_reviews.text: perfect for a small spot where you need to hang things such as bills to pay or lists. I even have my spare keys hanging on it and the school calendar
customer_reviews.author: Donna O. Baumgartner

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a good board.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing board. Sturdy & nicely framed. It arrived securely packed. If you want a good functional board at a great price, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to someone who needs something like this
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cheap bulletin board for my room, and this was the cheapest one I could find that would match my theme. It does its job well, I have it hanging up using command strips I ordered on Amazon, and it has been up for a few months. I would recommend this to someone who needs something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: great board
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for in a push pin board. Only issue I find is the hangers that come attached cant be placed on any side. You're locked into 1 position instead of vertical and horizontal.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hanselman

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better customer service.
customer_reviews.text: It works great— as expected. Not too thin; sturdy enough. No complaints. Honestly, I can’t get too excited about a cork board. What was such an awesome surprise, though was how they handled an issue that wasn’t even their fault (mishandling by mail person). Awesome customer service—would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Chang

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: The framing and overall appearance is perfect for the spot I hung it over my desk. I use clothespin thumbtacks for ease of posting. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adele R. Marcucci

customer_reviews.title: Best cork board ever...
customer_reviews.text: I love this board. Push pins slide right in. Great size and looks nice on my wall. It was delivered in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Bulletin Board
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, excellent quality and nice, big size. The cork has nice springiness, too. Was first sent wrong bulletin board, but this was Amazon's fault, not the company's. However, company ceo contacted me right away and my problem was resolved in record time. Got the right board and love it. Highly recommend. Worth the extra money and top shelf customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Stargal

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Really like the product. Comes with clips on the side to hang it horizontally but I'm using it vertically to save space on my desk. Bigger than I thought it would be and I didn't realize it came with two little baggies of tacks. The tacks go all the way through the board which I liked alot. The board is light, and I imagine after MUCH use you might need to replace it. Overall Im glad I bought it and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: micah

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Put my son’s activity schedule on it for the month. Easy for him to see at Peppermint Ridge, home for developmentally disabled adults.
customer_reviews.author: Turkeyjo

customer_reviews.title: Nice pop of color in the home office
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition. Familiarity with a screwdriver is needed to convert to vertical hanging. Nowhere is it written that something as utilitarian as a bulletin board has to be boring; thank you for the beautiful blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: It could have been just a little larger. The next size was too large. But it is working out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Asher/Shiloh

customer_reviews.title: Just the Bulletin Board We Were Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the size we were looking for. Nice and lightweight and very easy to hang. Product was exactly as described and came very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Howard M. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Great bulletin board!
customer_reviews.text: This bulletin board is perfect!! The push pins go into the cork board easily, and don't leave noticeable holes when removed. This is smaller than the bulletin board we replaced, but its size is perfect for the amount of items we place on it. It is very attractive and was easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wollin

customer_reviews.title: Great for by the door or other small space
customer_reviews.text: A perfect little bulletin for a nook. Easy to install on its sliding hangers. It even comes with a supply of colorful tacks.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian H. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Bulletin Board Set - Cork Board 24 x 18"
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product based on dimensions and the fact that the back is recessed, so that it could conceal a socket plate w/o too much compromise. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J Camp

customer_reviews.title: Great bulletin board for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for what I needed. Was shipped fast and received without any damage would buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Middleton Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Lightweight, easy to put up, comes with a good number of pins. Just what I needed. Won't last forever, but for now it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Bertelson

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product; terrific costumer service
customer_reviews.text: The customer service was exceptional. I contacted the company regarding the (mis)handling of the product during the shipping. (It arrived dented -- no fault of the company.) Regardless, the CEO emailed me back promptly. He quickly resolved the issue, and the new product I arrived intact. It looks fantastic with my mix of photos. All these positive reviews for the product are well earned. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nunyo Demasio

customer_reviews.title: Well done...reputable product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st at home bulletin board and i love it. Came carefully packaged and worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: Jolie

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected it to be
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected it to be. The size is appropriate and it seems to be of good quality. It did not come with the colored pins, but that’s not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jude Scelfo

customer_reviews.title: They are fine.
customer_reviews.text: Since they are small we are using 2. They are good for the money, easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Wentzy

customer_reviews.title: So pleased with this item
customer_reviews.text: The board came quickly, and was so easy to hang. Very light, and perfect over my desk. I have my latest photos pinned up to enjoy. I don't use the tacks, as they aren't as easy for me to handle as the pins. Only suggestion I have is to include all push-pins, and forget the tacks. So, Navypenguin, well done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and good size
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money and superb customer service. I would definitely purchase from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Iva_da

customer_reviews.title: I love the blue color rather than the tradition cork color
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I love the blue color rather than the tradition cork color. Adds a splash of color to my laundry room where I pin up important notes. Good solid bulletin board. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: melhels

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for - perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for...perfect size for desk nook off of my kitchen. Very easy to hang; sliding adjustable hooks eliminate the need to measure the distance between the hooks. Make sure to look for the tacks that are included (they were taped to the inside of the box so I thought they weren't there at first).
customer_reviews.author: Brockster

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Light and easy to install. Delivered as promised on time and very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Ktfree40

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about it!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect! The size, the color and it's overall stability! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: DianeNailTech

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, for above my son’s desk. I like that it’s not heavy and bulky, as some are.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my elderly father (96) whose short term memory is becoming a great problem for him. The bulletin board is a great design to hang in his kitchen where his phone is located so he can easily see his calendar and other notes, reminders.
customer_reviews.author: lms

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous cork board!
customer_reviews.text: Super cork board and even better than I could have imagined! Great size sturdy and made well. Love the adjustable hangers. It was a cinch to put up! Arrived perfectly packaged no damage! Don’t hesitate buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: A. Cutonilli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small area that I wanted to put a cork board. This fit perfectly. I has rounded corners with a cap. Very well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Waiting

customer_reviews.title: Smaller size
customer_reviews.text: Had small area over desk and this fit perfectly. Sturdy and easy to install. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: J. allen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 10 year old granddaughter's birthday gift and she loved it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Right size and made well so tacks won't go thru to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dorn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item to hold Honeydew projects.
customer_reviews.text: Installed in just minutes. Pins do not go through to the wall. Pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: cyn

customer_reviews.title: It did the job
customer_reviews.text: Need a small board to fit a small ass place worked out well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold tacks well.
customer_reviews.text: I like this board, otherwise, but what's the point of making something like this it if it doesn't hold thumbtacks properly? I constantly have to fix them.
customer_reviews.author: Author Lindsay Swanberg

customer_reviews.title: fine product
customer_reviews.text: lightweight but well constructed ... perfect fit for my door ..... adjustable hanger tabs are very nice feature
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, easy to hang board
customer_reviews.text: Just the size I wanted. Easy to hang. Looks quite neat.
customer_reviews.author: toracat

customer_reviews.title: Nice board, but smaller cork area than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged, but the manufacturer, Navy Penguin, replaced it immediately. Is everything that is advertised except that it is stated as 24" x 18" and is actually 23.5" x 17.5" and the cork portion is only 22" x 16".
customer_reviews.author: AJN

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT DESIGN
customer_reviews.text: I like the sleek look that compliments my web design work.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T Spellman

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t find any thumbtacks in the box but we are happy with the board.
customer_reviews.author: Be

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the office. Just wish I had ordered a slightly larger size.
customer_reviews.author: rmathenia

customer_reviews.title: A little light
customer_reviews.text: These are not as heavy as I expected and my son was able to bump them down easily, but so far they have held up. The blue is a little bright too.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Perfect for what we need it for (USA stadium map)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality:  Worth the Extra $
customer_reviews.text: Solid value. Should we ever need another, this is the one we will look for
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: I like the board but can’t use at present time
customer_reviews.text: Corner is damaged and I can’t drive at least give me a discount if you want my daughter to take a picture of it she can I’ve fractured my collarbone so can’t do
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: The best board for pins!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend to any one who is collecting enamel pins. The board is sturdy. The pins stay put. I love that the board is blue. I wish the company would make a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: April Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable hanging hooks....
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely liked this bulletin board. The 16 x 12 inch size was just what I needed for hanging in my kitchen to post Dr. appmts and shopping lists etc. I was 100% satisfied with this purchase. Nice blue color also.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Matz

customer_reviews.title: Spendy but Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems a little expensive for a cork board, but the cork board I bought for 12$ was terrible so I guess you get what you pay for. Push pins go in really easily. There are rings at the top to hang it from making installing it very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Ross

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I was looking for a cork board I could hang up without using any nails or anything that might damage the wall. Since this comes with loops, I was able to use command strip hooks to attach it to the wall. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I did pry the hanging hooks off with a screw driver and moved them to the "side" so I could hang it "up and down". Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: W. Wright

customer_reviews.title: granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My pre teen granddaughter loves it. She has it decorated with little lights and pictures.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Great size & well made; easy to set up. Really liked that it had hangers installed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my class assignment schedules and a calendar
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my class assignment schedules and a calendar. Comes with two different types of push pins in every color! Hung it with two of the push pins and it works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: I put it in my kitchen for my pictures instead of putting them in the refrigerator and it looks flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalia Valentin

customer_reviews.title: Flops around
customer_reviews.text: Only hangs by 2 hooks, so not solidly attached to wall.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Bulletin Board
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bulletin board for my office to pin notes on. It suits my purposes exactly; sturdy yet lightweight and a reasonable size. It comes with wall hangers but I just lean mine against the wall and it works fine. I would buy this again if the need arose.
customer_reviews.author: R H Lawrence III

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect bulletin board for my daughter. It was easy for her to place the pins in the board to hold up her notes, and she loved the blue color. I loved the wear-resistant corners and the adjustable hanging hooks...great quality and durability. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money...
customer_reviews.text: The cork board is great, deep enough for a variety of pins (those included and some of my own), light but sturdy, and a good size for my home office. I would not hesitate to order again. Also a 2 minute response time to an email - great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Philip T.

product_meta.title: Cork Board Set - Bulletin Corkboard 16 x 12 inch Framed with 10 Thumb Tacks - Small Wall Hanging Message Memo Pin Tackboard Organizer for Home, Office, Desk and Cubicle (Cork 16x12")
product_meta.description:
Color:Cork 16x12'Cork Board Set - Bulletin Corkboard with 10 colorful push pins 

✔ Premium Pack - contains 1 natural cork bulletin board + 10 color pins. Best value. 
✔ Easy to install - Movable hanging hooks allow to adjust hanging distance easily. Aluminum frame lends a contemporary and durable design element. 
✔ Multifunctionality - delivers effective performance when planning, education, presentation and organization is needed. Suitable for home, office, school, dorm room or any other place. Great help for managers, teachers, students and kids. 
✔ Top quality material - natural cork surface is easy for organization and planning. Great for pinning notes, messages, pictures, memos, calendars, menus, reminders and more. 
✔ Perfect Size - exact size of the board is 15.8" x 11.8". 

CHOKING HAZARD: The set contains small parts. To avoid choking hazard, keep the pins away from kids and babies under 3 years. 

Navy Penguin - Lifetime Guarantee 
If you for any reason are not happy with any product by The Navy Penguin, please do not hesitate to contact us and we will do our best to solve your problem asap! At The Navy Penguin we take full ownership and responsibility for the quality of our products.
feature_bullets: PREMIUM PACK - contains 1 bulletin corkboard and 10 colored push pins as accessories.

PORTABLE DESIGN AND SIZE - exact size of the tackboard is 16 x 12 inches (hangable in Landscape/Horizontal orientation only). Movable hanging hooks allow to adjust a distance easily (this personal pinboard is wall mounted).

LIGHTWEIGHT AND DURABLE - natural cork surface of the tack board is great for pinning note, notices, supplies, messages, picture, photos, memo, calendar, menu, reminder and more.The memoboard has heavy duty aluminum frame.

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL USE - perfect vision thumbtack board for planning schedules, inspiration and chores organization. Suitable for home, fridge, office, cubicle, desk, class, school, college, dorm, kitchen, locker, child room, door or any other place. Help for managers, teachers, students and kids.
LIFETIME GUARANTEE - if you for any reason are not happy with the notice board, please contact us, we'll send you a free replacement or refund your money.
